edu.berkeley.compbio.phyloutils
Interface TaxonomySynonymService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaxonomyBasedSynonymService
public interface TaxonomySynonymService

Map taxonomic names to synonymous taxonomic names. Does not expose a unique ID per taxon. Note this is not needed to solve the problem of finding a node id matching a given name; that is dealt with TaxonStringIdMapper. The reason this is done this way is that we want to use the Ncbi synonym table to help map names to prokmsa_ids, but we don't want to get ncbi taxids in the mix.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Soergel
